title: Meditating with John Vervaeke - Day 10 - Live Stream every Mon-Fri at 09:30 EST
description:
Please join me for a daily meditation live stream every day at 09:30 AM EST, except Sundays. In these challenging times, meditation can help ground us and cope with stress.

Here is the playlist for this Meditating with John Vervaeke series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLND1JCRq8VuhdS9IL92M2jLmzAo3dHkJT

Mondays and Thursdays are slightly longer lesson days, with a 15 minute sit and time for questions. Tue, Wed, Fri, & Sat are 15 minute sits with time for questions.

You can support my work on Patreon, with the proceeds going into the research I do at the University of Toronto on the Meaning Crisis and the cultivation of wisdom here: https://www.patreon.com/johnvervaeke
